subject: X Games
Snowmobiles
lead_paragraph: The prognosis is poor for Caleb Moore, the snowmobiler who was critically injured Thursday at the Winter X Games in Aspen, Colo., a relative said.
snippet: The prognosis is poor for Caleb Moore, the snowmobiler who was critically injured Thursday at the Winter X Games in Aspen, Colo., a relative said.
